text: "Man in the Mirror" is a song by the American singer Michael Jackson. It was written by Siedah Garrett and Glen Ballard. It was released as the fourth single from Jackson's seventh album, Bad (1987). It was nominated for Record of the Year at the Grammy Awards. It reached number one in the Billboard Hot 100. In 2009, Michael Jackson died and the song entered the charts again. It reached number two in the UK Singles Chart. This was much higher than when the song was first released in 1988.
